pnp:CanvasControlProperty.Value: Please stop by the HR offices to pick up the new 401K packets. These packets contain all the information you need to set up or update your 401K for the new year.

We have distributed the updated medical packages pamphlet and we realize all these changes will raise some questions. Make an appointment with your HR representative today to help navigate all the new medical benefits packages and changes from earlier years.
Contoso encourages our employees to come to us with any issue they might have. We want them to feel comfortable talking with upper management and know that they’re being heard.

pnp:ClientSidePage.Title: New benefits options for your family

pnp:CanvasControlProperty.Value: As enrollment season begins, we wanted to inform you of the changes on this year's choices. From new dental plans to more flexibility with your health savings account.

pnp:ClientSidePage.Title: Taking flight: Student mentorship opportunities at Contoso

pnp:CanvasControlProperty.Value:
Contoso partners with local schools.

Local school districts are looking for volunteers to mentor students interested in world travel. If you have a passion to help others, this is the opportunity for you. 

Giving back to the community is one of our core values. Getting started is easy. Learn more at our upcoming program meetings, or schedule a lunch with one of our program experts to see just how you can help.
Contoso President, Patti Fernadez delivered a key note address detailing Contoso's mission and goals for the upcoming year.

pnp:ClientSidePage.Title: Corporate Communications Define Your Brand and Culture

pnp:CanvasControlProperty.Value: Corporate communications are carefully crafted key messages that provide the face and voice to your brand. They define your culture and company to the world.

Successful product growth and engagement is fundamentally linked to whether customers understand and realize the value it offers. While all product teams aspire to create an elegant user experience and functionality that enables customers to intuitively “get it” after they try it, product marketers are focused on conveying the product’s value to the customer to engage, convert and retain them. Product marketers play a key role in driving awareness and trial as well as packaging the product to appeal to customers. They accomplish this by packaging a product’s features and functionality into messaging and positioning, pricing, and collateral.

pnp:ClientSidePage.Title: The importance of branding at Contoso

pnp:CanvasControlProperty.Value: At the heart of branding at Contoso is the promise that is made by us to our customers. The brand promise tells them who we are, what we believe in, and what unique value we provide.

Branding is important to the success of any organization, but it's particularly important for us at Contoso Electronics. This news posts is an example of how you can use two different images for display. The top header image is 1920 x 1080 with a safe space of 320px in height - where the posters are aligned to. In page details, there is a second image that will display as the news thumbnail. It is also 1920x1080, a 16:9 ratio that works best in most of our thumbnail displays.

pnp:ClientSidePage.Title: Contoso Eagle launch and the future

pnp:CanvasControlProperty.Value:
We have lift off!

This year at the FlySafe Conference I had the opportunity to give the keynote address, with more then 6,000 attendees and press, on advancements in drone technology for the professional and consumer market with a hint to what the future of our industry holds.  

It was an honor to represent the results of your hard work and dedication on our products.  If you haven't already had a chance please watch the summary of our product updates.
Congratulations Contoso team! This September we set a new annual sales record.

pnp:DataRow.pnp:DataValue: Thanksgiving Day and Day after Thanksgiving

pnp:CanvasControlProperty.Value:
Welcome to your benefits portal

Learn what’s covered, track your balances and usage, get help managing your benefits, and more. We are excited to introduce you to our world-class benefits package.

pnp:ClientSidePage.Title: New benefits options for your family

pnp:CanvasControlProperty.Value: As enrollment season begins, we wanted to inform you of the changes on this year's choices. From new dental plans to more flexibility with your health savings account.
Contoso encourages our employees to come to us with any issue they might have. We want them to feel comfortable talking with upper management and know that they’re being heard.

We have distributed the updated medical packages pamphlet and we realize all these changes will raise some questions. Make an appointment with your HR representative today to help navigate all the new medical benefits packages and changes from earlier years.
Please stop by the HR offices to pick up the new 401K packets. These packets contain all the information you need to set up or update your 401K for the new year.
